name: Offbeat Snowflake
description:
"Screw the beat!" - Offbeat Snowflake

Type the spell. Smash space. Cool down this house.

Offbeat Snowflake will chill this dance floor with the ice cube magic and infinite power of coolness. How much fire will you turn to sizzles?

Music made in BeepBox

In-game font: Karmatic Arcade
